event.title: Ada & Zangemann reading at Grundschule am Langen Graben in Schw√§bisch-Hall, Germany

body.p: On 6 February, Matthias Kirschner will read the book 'Ada & Zangemann - A tale of software, skateboards, and raspberry ice cream' to two second and two third classes at the "Grundschule am Langen Graben". Afterwards there will be discussions with the pupils about software, hardware, tinkering, and of course their favourite ice cream.
